Introduction¶

mdfelib helps to process XML instance documents that obey the mdfe XML schema.

With mdfelib (mdfelib.py) you can write Python code to:

  • Parse an XML document that obeys the mdfe XML schema, creating instances of the Python classes that represent the types defined in the mdfe schema. These Python classes are defined in mdfelib.py.
  • Create instances of classes that represent the types described in the mdfe XML schema.
  • Write Python application code that uses the classes that represent mdfe types.
  • Export the objects to an XML document.

Schemas¶

The mdfelib.py module in this package was generated from the XML schemas in ./schemas.

generateDS.py¶

The mdfelib.py module in this package was generated by generateDS.py. You can learn about generateDS.py here: http://www.rexx.com/~dkuhlman/generateDS.html
